en: He did a good bit of waiting.

en: He is what is called a man of culture.

en: He is not your common doting parent.

en: He has various knowledge.

en: He knows lots.

en: He is always true to his friends.

zh: 他通常在早餐前浏览报纸。

en: He is always working from morning till night.
He always leaves for work at 8:00 a.m.
He always goes to work at 8:00 a.m.
He is not always late.
He doesn't always come late.
He seems to be always in conflict with someone.
zh: 他似乎总是和别人有冲突。

en: He has always associated with large enterprises.
zh: 他一直以来都和大型企业有联系。

en: He is always complaining of ill treatment.
zh: 他总是抱怨受到不公平的待遇。

en: He always relies on other people.
He always tries to see the good in others.
zh: 他总是试图看到别人的优点。

en: He is always ready to find fault with other people.
zh: 他总是喜欢挑别人的毛病。

en: He is always finding fault with other people.
He always makes a fool of others.
He always makes a ready answer.
He is always finding fault with his teacher.
zh: 他总是挑他老师的毛病。

en: He always spends his money freely.
He always wears blue shirts.
He always speaks of the government with contempt.
zh: 他总是用轻蔑的语气谈论政府。

en: He is always at the top of the class.
zh: 他总是在班里名列前茅。

en: He has always had a great curiosity about the world.
zh: 他对世界一直充满好奇。

en: He always tries to trip people up.
zh: 他总是想方设法地绊倒别人。

en: He is always giving people a lot of trouble.
zh: 他总是给别人添很多麻烦。

en: He is always natural with other people.
zh: 他和别人相处总是很自然。

en: He really has it out for people.
He always plans a thing out carefully before he does it.
zh: 他做事之前总是仔细计划。

en: He's always complaining about the food.
He is always joking.
He is always at odds with his boss.
zh: 他总是和他的老板意见不合。

en: He is always partial to the company of girls.
zh: 他总是喜欢和女孩子在一起。

en: He always stays in bed as late as he can.
zh: 他总是尽可能地睡懒觉。

en: He's always late for class.
He is always harassed with debts.
He always leaves home at seven.
He always puts himself first.
zh: 他总是把自己放在第一位。

en: He always shows off his abilities.
zh: 他总是炫耀自己的能力。

en: He is always boasting of his achievements.
zh: 他总是吹嘘自己的成就。

en: He always persisted in his errors.
zh: 他总是坚持自己的错误。

en: He is always vague about his intentions.
zh: 他总是对他的意图含糊其辞。

en: He always insisted that he was in the right.
zh: 他总是坚持自己是对的。

en: He is always punctual.
He always mistakes me for my sister.
zh: 他总是把我误认为我的妹妹。

en: He is always making a fool of me.
zh: 他总是戏弄我，让我出丑。

en: He always invited me to his dinner parties.
zh: 他总是邀请我参加他的晚宴。

en: He gives me a bad time, as he always does.
He usually drops in at my place.
He is always on my side.
He is always finding fault with me.
He is always complaining about the way I do things.
zh: 他总是抱怨我做事的方式。

en: He always behaved badly to me.
He always imposes his opinion on me.
zh: 他总是把他的意见强加于我。

en: He always makes cynical remarks to me.
He is always friendly to me.
He is always with me.
He's always breaking into our conversation.
zh: 他总是打断我们的谈话。

en: He's always trying to say something to us.
zh: 他总是想对我们说什么。

en: He is always yelling at his children.
zh: 他总是对他的孩子们大喊大叫。

en: He always leaves his work half done.
zh: 他总是把工作半途而废。

en: He always works with all his might.
He always hums while working.
He is always behind time with his work.
I wish I was always being sent abroad on business like he is.
zh: 我真希望我能像他一样总是被派到国外出差。

en: He is always losing his umbrella.
He always reads a magazine.
He always quarrels with his wife.
zh: 他总是和他的妻子吵架。

en: He always troubles himself about minor things.
He is always happy.
He always speaks at random.
He always wears heavy clothes.
He always talks as though he were addressing a public meeting.
zh: 他总是像在公共场合演讲一样说话。

en: He is not always in the office in the morning.
zh: 他早上不总是在办公室。

en: He always gets home at six o'clock in the evening.
He always gets home at 6:00 p.m.
He's always running short of cash.
He always teaches from notes.
He always possesses good health.
He is always at home on Mondays.
On Mondays, he's always at home.
He's always at home on Mondays.
He's always looking at you. He must love you.
zh: 他总是看着你，他一定是爱上你了。

en: He's always looking at you.
He is always pressed for money.
He is always day-dreaming.
He is always willing to help others.
He is always full of vigor.
He always wears his school tie.
zh: 他总是戴着他的学校领带。

en: He is always late for school.
He's always late for school.
He is always seeking pleasure.
He always tries to have his own way.
zh: 他总是想按自己的方式行事。

en: He is always dwelling on the pleasures of the past.
zh: 他总是沉湎于过去的快乐。

en: He always takes his time in everything he does.
zh: 他做任何事总是慢条斯理。

en: He complains about one thing or another all the time.
He is forever complaining about something.
He has always devoted himself to music.
He always values his wife's opinions.
zh: 他总是很重视他妻子的意见。

en: He is always speaking ill of his wife.
zh: 他总是说他妻子的坏话。

en: He's always saying bad things about his wife.
zh: 他总是说他妻子的坏话。

en: He's always bad-mouthing his wife.
zh: 他总是说他妻子的坏话。

en: He always parades his knowledge of English.
zh: 他总是炫耀他的英语知识。

en: He's always anxious to pick up gossip.
zh: 他总是急于打听小道消息。

en: He always works hard.
He always studies hard.
He always says one word too many.
He always passes for a great scholar.
He worked harder than ever.
zh: 他比以往任何时候都更努力地工作。

en: He always walks with a rifle.
As he had worked longer than usual, he felt tired.
zh: 因为他工作的时间比平时长，所以他感到疲倦。

en: Since he had worked longer than usual, he felt tired.
zh: 因为他工作的时间比平时长，所以他感到疲倦。

en: He felt tired because he had worked longer than usual.
zh: 他感到疲倦，因为他工作的时间比平时长。

en: He came home later than usual.
He arrived earlier than usual.
He got up earlier than usual.
He is always up to no good.
He always plays well.
He always speaks from notes.
He always takes notes.
He always takes note of his boss's movements.
zh: 他总是留意他老板的动向。

en: He is constantly complaining.
He is always up and doing.
He's always asking silly questions.
He came late as usual.
He scratched his head out of habit.
He gave his sudden, goblin like grin.
zh: 他露出了他那突然的、像小妖精一样的笑容。

en: Don't fall for his old tricks.
He arrived late as usual.
He started talking about his ideals as usual.
zh: 他像往常一样开始谈论他的理想。

en: He got up at five as usual.
zh: 他像往常一样五点起床。

en: He went to bed at ten as usual.
zh: 他像往常一样十点睡觉。

en: He is as healthy as ever.
He is always as busy as a bee.
zh: 他总是像蜜蜂一样忙碌。

en: He always seems to be living rent-free in somebody's house.
zh: 他似乎总是住在别人家里不付房租。

en: He always tells at random.
He always worries about minor points.
That is how he always treats me.
He is always in a fidget.
It is always the case with him.
He always takes his coffee strong.
He's always short of money.
He is always asking for money.
He is always throwing his weight around.
He is always full of ideas.
He is always complaining of this and that.
He is always finding fault.
He was always finding fault with me.
He usually gets up at six.
He will love her forever.
He never loses his curiosity; he is, as it were, an eternal youth.
zh: 他从不失去好奇心；他仿佛是个永远的年轻人。

en: He kept on crying.
He usually takes a walk, book in hand.
zh: 他通常手拿一本书散步。

en: He always wants to have his own way.
zh: 他总是想按自己的方式行事。

en: He always treats me like a child.
zh: 他总是把我当小孩看待。

en: He always makes sure to come on time.
He makes mistakes every time he speaks English.
zh: 他每次说英语都会犯错。

en: He is a constant torment to me.
How is it that he solved the problem?
zh: 他是怎么解决这个问题的？

en: He is a man hard to get on with.
zh: 他是一个很难相处的人。

en: He left everything to chance.
zh: 他把一切都交给了命运。

en: When did he come here?
He will return to Japan some day.
zh: 他总有一天会回到日本的。

en: When did he arrive here?
zh: 他什么时候到达这里的？

en: He will come to see us some day.
zh: 他总有一天会来看我们的。

en: I believe he is going to be rich one day.
zh: 我相信他总有一天会变得富有。

en: He will be a Washington someday.
zh: 他总有一天会成为像华盛顿一样的人物。

en: Will he ever come back?
He told me when to say yes.
zh: 他告诉我什么时候该说是。

en: He wants to be an Edison some day.
zh: 他总有一天想成为像爱迪生一样的人物。

en: He picked out the best book.
He's been awarded a gold medal once.
zh: 他曾经获得过一枚金牌。

en: He has a basket full of strawberries.
zh: 他有一个装满草莓的篮子。

en: He is an Italian.
He was born in a small town in Italy.
zh: 他出生在意大利的一个小镇上。

en: He told me that he was going to Italy.
zh: 他告诉我他要去意大利。

en: He carried on the restaurant in Italy for many years.
zh: 他在意大利经营这家餐厅多年。

en: He cut down the tree for fun.
zh: 他为了好玩砍倒了那棵树。

en: He must have done it out of mischief.
zh: 他一定是出于恶作剧才这么做的。

en: He likes to be mischievous.
He has not gotten in touch with me for a long time under the pretence of being busy.
zh: 他以忙为借口，很久没有和我联系了。

en: He is leaning on the back of the chair.
He stood behind the chair.
He wriggled his way through the chairs.
He settled himself in a chair.
He sank into a chair.
He rose from his chair to welcome me.
zh: 他从椅子上站起来欢迎我。

en: In an emergency he had nothing to fall back upon.
zh: 在紧急情况下，他没有任何可以依靠的东西。

en: He is the last person to leave you in time of need.
zh: 他绝不会在你需要帮助的时候离开你。

en: He is rather hard to please.
He would be the last person to leave you in time of need.
zh: 他绝不会在你需要帮助的时候离开你。

en: He is a bad boy.
He can come up with any amount of money.
zh: 他能弄到任何数量的钱。

en: He collected bits of information.
He is on the heavy side.
How many does he want?
He is eminent for his great discoveries.
zh: 他因其伟大的发现而闻名。

en: He made several corrections.
He differs from me in some ways.
zh: 他在某些方面与我不同。

en: He collected various information.
He wrote several plays in verse.
zh: 他用诗体写了好几部剧本。

en: He owns several hotels. In a word, he is a multimillionaire.
zh: 他拥有好几家酒店。总而言之，他是个百万富翁。

en: He is well read in English literature.
He comes from England, but is very poor at English.
zh: 他来自英国，但英语很差。

en: He pretended to be an Englishman, but his foreign accent gave him away.
zh: 他假装是英国人，但他的外国口音出卖了他。

en: He's an Englishman, and, I guess, has known better days.
zh: 他是个英国人，我猜，他以前的日子更好过。

en: He comes from England.
He crossed over to England.
He is the only American who has swum the English Channel.
zh: 他是唯一一位游过英吉利海峡的美国人。

en: He is determined to go to England.
He has gone to Britain.
He has been to England twice.
It seems to me that he is from England.
zh: 依我看，他好像是英国人。

en: He is not an English boy.
He was in his home in Cambridge, England.
He seems to live in Britain.
It is said that he is in Britain.
Although he was born in England, he speaks English very badly.
zh: 虽然他出生在英国，但他的英语说得很差。

en: He was born in England, but was educated in America.
zh: 他出生在英国，但在美国接受教育。

en: He told of his adventures with animation.
zh: 他绘声绘色地讲述了他的冒险经历。

en: He must have lost his marbles.
He looks stern.
He speaks as if he had studied abroad.
zh: 他说话的口气好像在国外留学过。

en: He posed as my close friend.
He's a salesman's salesman.
He is never discouraged, no matter what difficulties he may face.
zh: 无论遇到什么困难，他都从不气馁。

en: He is never discouraged, no matter what difficulty he may face.
zh: 无论遇到什么困难，他都从不气馁。

en: He is mixed up with something shabby.
zh: 他和一些不正当的事情有牵连。

en: I don't think he'll say yes.
He seems to be a nice fellow.
zh: 他看起来是个不错的人。

en: He seems to be a nice guy.
zh: 他看起来是个不错的人。

en: He seems to be a good guy.
He won't be a good player.
zh: 他不会成为一个好球员的。

en: He will be a good teacher.
zh: 他会成为一个好老师的。

en: He seems like a good person.
He took great pains to do a good job.
zh: 他费尽心思把工作做好。

en: He earns a good salary.
I believe he is a nice guy.
He is a good fellow.
He checked in at a good hotel.
zh: 他住进了一家不错的酒店。

en: He's a good kid - very quick on the uptake and he does whatever needs to be done.
zh: 他是个好孩子——领悟能力很强，而且会做任何需要做的事情。

en: At best he may take third place.
He will make a good team captain.
zh: 他会成为一个优秀的队长。

en: He never did his work anyhow.
He is not a man to trifle with.
zh: 他可不是一个可以随便戏弄的人。

en: He appears to know Ann.
He ran so fast that he was out of breath.
zh: 他跑得太快了，以至于上气不接下气。

en: He isn't quite a gentleman.
zh: 他算不上一个真正的绅士。

en: Since he can read such tiny print, he is far from being near-sighted.
zh: 既然他能看这么小的字，那他肯定不是近视眼。

en: He wasn't happy in spite of all his wealth.
zh: 尽管他很富有，但他并不快乐。

en: I wonder if he can live on such a small salary.
zh: 我想知道他靠这么少的薪水能不能生活。

en: He ought to know better than to quarrel with such a fellow.
zh: 他应该懂得不该和那种人争吵。

en: He was rebuked for writing such a rough report.
zh: 他因为写了这么粗糙的报告而受到了斥责。

en: He is ashamed of having behaved so badly.
zh: 他为自己表现得如此糟糕而感到羞愧。

en: He is very much ashamed of having behaved so badly.
zh: 他为自己表现得如此糟糕而感到非常羞愧。

en: If he had not died so young, he would have become a great scientist.
zh: 如果他没有英年早逝，他会成为一位伟大的科学家。

en: He wants whipping for saying that.
zh: 他说了那样的话，应该挨鞭子。

en: He has been keeping company with Ann for three months.
zh: 他和安已经交往三个月了。

en: He married Ann.
He liked Ann, but then his parents didn't.
zh: 他喜欢安，但是他的父母不喜欢。

en: He claims that he is a painter.
He is none the wiser for all his experiences.
zh: 经历了这么多，他仍然一无所知。

en: He is torn by doubts.
He wrote a biography of a famous poet.
zh: 他写了一位著名诗人的传记。

en: He bought eggs and milk from a farmer.
zh: 他从一个农民那里买了鸡蛋和牛奶。

en: He is clever in some ways.
He says he has achieved his goal to a certain extent.
zh: 他说他在某种程度上实现了他的目标。

en: You can trust him to some degree but not wholly.
zh: 你可以在某种程度上信任他，但不能完全信任。

en: He left Japan on a fine day.
zh: 他在一个晴朗的日子离开了日本。

en: He was tormented by some deep sorrow.
zh: 他被某种深深的悲伤折磨着。

en: He had a certain charm.
He bought an English book at a bookstore.
zh: 他在书店买了一本英文书。

en: He worked for a rich man.
He keeps company with a foreign student.
zh: 他和一位外国留学生交往。
